properties.body:
EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
VESSEL, 200 PERSONS ON BOARD, SUNK IN 33-44N 012-14E.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 3906 5908 4527,
FAX: 3906 5922 737 OR 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
